LOOTBOX_HELP_DESCRIPTION: Open lootboxes to earn extra exp.
LOOTBOX_HELP_USAGE: Open a lootbox to earn extra exp and other rewards.```/lootbox open```
Disable/enable ability for members to open lootboxes (Admins only).```/lootbox toggle```
Check your current statistics for lootboxes.```/lootbox stats```

LOOTBOX_DISABLED: Lootboxes have now been **disabled** in this server.
